## protocolRouter() function

Create a middleware that executes different handlers based on protocol

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function protocolRouter(handlers: Record<string, (ctx: KoattyContext, next: KoattyNext) => Promise<any>>, defaultHandler?: (ctx: KoattyContext, next: KoattyNext) => Promise<any>): (ctx: KoattyContext, next: KoattyNext) => Promise<any>;
```
